sentence: In early trading on Monday, shares of Nike ( NKE ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 1.2%.
Year to date, Nike has lost about 13.4% of its value.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Home Depot ( HD ), trading down 1.8%.
Home Depot is lower by about 2.2% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Verizon Communications ( VZ ), trading down 0.0%, and United Technologies ( UTX ), trading up 1.1% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
